content.query:
SELECT top (100)
    CAST ( time as date) as fecha
    , CodigoNacional as estacion 
    , COALESCE(MAX(HR_Valor),0) AS max_hum
    , COALESCE(MIN(HR_Valor),0) AS min_hum
    , COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(HR_Valor),2),0) AS prom_hum
    FROM dbo.humedad
    GROUP BY CAST( time as date ), CodigoNAcional
